channel.title: Drake - "if you're reading this it's too late" surprise album
channel.description:
Drake dropped a new album out of nowhere today. Currently on the 3rd track, it's feels a bit more serious than his other work.
Listen to it free here:
[url=http://www.livemixtapes.com/embed.php?album_id=32538]http://www.livemixtapes.com/embed.php?album_id=32538[/url]
Edit: review
Not a fan. He went in on a couple songs, but besides that it was pretty half assed. Not a fan of the artists he brought in for some songs too. The tracks didn't transition as well as some of his past albums, and his wordplay was lacking. There were maybe 2 or 3 songs I would actually want, but the rest is pretty much filler. Apparently he's set to drop a full, not as shit album soon, as rumors have spread that this was a way to get out of his deal with his current record company.
4.5/10.

item.title: Drake - "if you're reading this it's too late" surprise album
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

There are some songs from his past that I’ve liked but I don’t listen to this genre of music, the tape came out of nowhere as most have said but it’s meh. I’ll listen to it just because of the fact that I used to like some of his songs.

The link doesn’t work for me, by the way. I found another link on YouTube that works… for obvious reasons, the link probably won’t last much longer as YT is quite quick to copyright it than I’ve seen on most artists (even the ones that the artist deal with themselves, and their legal team etc.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rlITSnioJEE

Read full topic
